name: Egg Meets Sperm - GO GODOT JAM 3
name_original: Egg Meets Sperm - GO GODOT JAM 3
description:
Created for GO GODOT JAM 3

Theme: EVOLUTION

Joined late so did not have much time

Was a lot of fun though so I hope you like playing it

At later stages, you kinda feel like a God :)

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Space to pause the game

Kill the sperm, when they die they leave bonuses

You will automatically shoot when the sperm is in range

Can you last until the perfect sperm arrives?

Intelligence increases rate of fire

Strength increases the damage

Sight increase the shooting range
